title: Sanguinesti region

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Sanguinesti region is a large area found in south-east Morytania. It consists of two cities, Darkmeyer and Meiyerditch, which merge together to form a conurbation. Darkmeyer is located to the north of the region. Darkmeyer is the only known Vampyric settlement on Gielinor. In the south is Meiyerditch, a sprawling ghetto which houses the area's human population.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Sanguinesti region
"Sanguinesti" redirects here. For the staff, see Sanguinesti staff.
Sanguinesti region
Released4 September 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
CapitalDarkmeyer
InhabitantsVampyres, Humans, Cats, Dogs
Map
Advanced data
Typeregion

The Sanguinesti region is a large area found in south-east Morytania. It consists of two cities, Darkmeyer and Meiyerditch, which merge together to form a conurbation. Darkmeyer is located to the north of the region. Darkmeyer is the only known Vampyric settlement on Gielinor. In the south is Meiyerditch, a sprawling ghetto which houses the area's human population.

The Sanguinesti region is ruled by Lord Drakan and his family. The Vampyre juveniles are used as guards, and the Vyrewatch as a blood-harvesting police force, who also keep the populace under control. The humans in Meiyerditch are treated as serfs, regularly being drained of their blood supply and being forced to serve their Vampyric masters.

The area is separated from the remainder of Morytania through the Vyre Wall which acts to enclose the human populace of Meiyerditch from escape and to separate the two races from each other, thus effectively protecting the Vampyres of Darkmeyer. The wall extends around Meiyerditch - where regular patrols of Vyrewatch roam - and stretches between Darkmeyer and Meiyerditch. The wall surrounds Castle Drakan and its adjoining Darkmeyer, where it is heavily reinforced, and which players can unlock access to after the Sins of the Father quest.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • "Sanguinesti", from the Latin word sanguis and the Romanian suffix -ești, means "blood city".

'''The Sanguinesti region''' is a large area found in south-east [[Morytania]]. It consists of two cities, [[Darkmeyer]] and [[Meiyerditch]], which merge together to form a conurbation. Darkmeyer is located to the north of the region. Darkmeyer is the only known [[Vampyre|Vampyric]] settlement on [[Gielinor]]. In the south is Meiyerditch, a sprawling ghetto which houses the area's human population.

The Sanguinesti region is ruled by [[Lord Drakan]] and his family. The [[Vampyre juvenile]]s are used as guards, and the [[Vyrewatch]] as a blood-harvesting police force, who also keep the populace under control. The humans in Meiyerditch are treated as serfs, regularly being drained of their blood supply and being forced to serve their Vampyric masters.

The area is separated from the remainder of Morytania through the Vyre Wall which acts to enclose the human populace of Meiyerditch from escape and to separate the two races from each other, thus effectively protecting the Vampyres of Darkmeyer. The wall extends around Meiyerditch - where regular patrols of Vyrewatch roam - and stretches between Darkmeyer and Meiyerditch. The wall surrounds Castle Drakan and its adjoining Darkmeyer, where it is heavily reinforced, and which players can unlock access to after the Sins of the Father quest.

==Trivia==
* "Sanguinesti", from the Latin word ''[[wiktionary:sanguis|sanguis]]'' and the Romanian suffix ''[[wiktionary:-ești|-ești]]'', means "blood city".
